2025-11-27T22:45:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-11-27T22:45:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-11-28T17:14:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the cancellation of Hong Kong Cyclothon, the special traffic and public transport service arrangements earlier announced for the event will be cancelled accordingly.
2025-11-28T17:14:00.CONTENT_CN: 因應香港單車節宣告取消，早前公布的相關特別交通及公共運輸安排同告取消。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Enhanced Support on the East Rail Line and MTR Bus Service
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 東鐵綫及港鐵巴士特別支援安排

2025-11-29T06:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that In view of the transportation needs near the Tai Po area, the train frequency will be enhanced on the relevant section of the East Rail Line during the morning peak today to ease passenger flow. Extra MTR staff will also be deployed at relevant stations to assist passengers. MTR Buses for Tai Po area will also enhance service for the residents.
2025-11-29T06:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 因應大埔區附近的交通需要，東鐵綫今早繁忙時段將額外加密相關路段的班次，以疏導客流，並於相關車站加強人手協助乘客。大埔區內的港鐵巴士路線亦會加密班次接載居民。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Traffic at High Island Reservoir East Dam

2025-11-29T09:55:00.CONTENT_EN: The Transport Department announced that the traffic on Sai Kung Man Yee Road leading to High Island Reservoir East Dam is very busy at the moment. The operator of Green Minibus Route No. 9A has strengthened its service to cater for passenger demand. Visitors are advised to plan ahead their journeys, reserve sufficient commuting time, and be patient while queuing.
2025-11-29T09:55:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署表示，通往萬宜水庫東壩的西貢萬宜路交通現時非常繁忙，專線小巴第9A號線的營辦商已加強服務應對乘客需求。請遊人妥善計劃行程，預留充裕交通時間，同時在輪候時保持忍讓。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park now full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-11-29T14:45:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-11-29T14:45:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Commissioning of New Traffic Lane at Hong Kong Island Bound Exit of Western Harbour Crossing
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 西區海底隧道往香港島方向出口增建行車線的啟用

2025-11-29T18:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Motorists are advised that, the new traffic lane at Hong Kong Island Bound Exit of Western Harbour Crossing will be commissioned from 6.00 am on 30 November 2025 (Sunday). Upon the commissioning of the new traffic lane, the slip road leading from Western Harbour Crossing to Central District, Sai Ying Pun and Sheung Wan will be expanded to three traffic lanes, providing two traffic lanes heading for Central District and one traffic lane heading for Sai Ying Pun or Sheung Wan. Appropriate traffic signs and road markings will be provided on-site to guide motorists.
2025-11-29T18:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 駕駛人士請注意，西區海底隧道往香港島方向出口增建的行車線將於2025年11月30日（星期日）上午6時起啟用。屆時，由西區海底隧道通往中區、西營盤及上環的支路將擴闊至三線行車道，提供兩條行車線往中區，以及一條行車線往西營盤或上環。 有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，指導駕駛人士。

2025-11-30T14:50:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-11-30T14:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。
